字幕颜色: victory in the northern nine province!

字幕内容: Nangong Rang: Hahahaha
with victory in the northern nine provinces
the Chionghua Princess’ newly-born son
shall be named…
Shangguan Fu!
Jingnu: You
the ocean depths
sincerity
I
sated my thirst
what I sowed

the diverging path
before my eyes
I
can't hate
can't decide
My heart
ground to dust
There is no room for regret in a path towards a dead end
Jingnu: My love
No one to blame
Except me for a true love wrongly given
Qi Yan: The path
no hesitation
no calculation
Jingnu: Sigh

ground to dust
